text: Oprah has given the world so much : reasons to run home and turn on the TV every afternoon ( oh, how we miss The Oprah Winfrey Show ) ; excuses to tune out the world by putting on your headphones ( those SuperSoul podcasts always do the trick ), and examples on how to live our best lives ( with, um, everything she does ). And in 2018, the O of O somehow managed to continue being the gift that keeps on giving. She graced the big screen in A Wrinkle in Time, gave the speech heard'round the world, and helped Michelle Obama give high school girls the surprise of a lifetime. Plus, her wigs took on a life of their own, she delivered countless gems on her Instagram, and made us all green with glasses
